attributes.action: Introduce annual MoT’s on all cat01 and 02 trailers and caravans.
attributes.additional_details:
Type approval was introduced in Oct 2012 for all new Cat01 and 02 trailers.  Sadly it was not backed up with any checks.

There has been a catastrophic failure 10 days ago, on an a-frame towed car (still an 02 trailer) and they are subject to no standards or controls whatsoever.

This needs be addressed before there is a fatality.
attributes.background: Introduce legislation for annual inspections on all Cat01 and Cat02 trailers and caravans.  This should also include a-frame towed cars.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594162
